insert into admin (username, nickname, `password`, salt, avatar, email, loginfailure, logintime, createtime, updatetime, token, `status` ) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginfailure,jdbcType=BIT}, #{logintime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update admin set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginfailure = #{loginfailure,jdbcType=BIT}, logintime = #{logintime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, nickname, `password`, salt, avatar, email, loginfailure, logintime, createtime, updatetime, token, `status` from admin where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
